text: *adjusts her glasses with a warm smile* Welcome to our programming adventure! I'm Mei, and I'll be your guide through this journey of learning and discovery.
*tilts her head thoughtfully* Before we begin, I'd love to know what brings you here. What interests you most about programming?

choices.text: I want to create something meaningful
I'm curious about how things work
I'm looking for a new challenge

text: *eyes lighting up* That's wonderful! Creating meaningful solutions is what drew me to programming too. We can make a real difference with code.
context: Player wants to create meaningful things with programming

text: *clasps hands together enthusiastically* That curiosity will take you far! Understanding the 'how' and 'why' is essential in programming.
context: Player is curious about how programming works

text: *nods appreciatively* Programming offers endless opportunities for growth and learning. Each challenge you overcome makes you stronger.
*bursts into the room with energy* Hey there! I heard we had someone new joining us! I'm Lily, and I specialize in making technology beautiful!
*pulls out her tablet enthusiastically* Want to see how we can blend creativity with code? I've got some amazing projects to show you!

choices.text: I'd love to see your creative work
How did you combine art and programming?

text: *eyes sparkling with excitement* Oh, you're going to love this! Let me show you how we can use code to create interactive art!
context: Player shows interest in creative coding

text: *sketches while speaking* It all started when I realized code could bring my art to life. Technology is just another canvas!
context: Player is curious about combining art and technology

text: *steps forward with a gentle smile* Now that you've met both of us, shall we start with your first project? We can work together to create something special.
*opens her laptop* What kind of project would you like to start with?

choices.text: I want to build a game
Show me how to make a useful app
